name: Lisk Surge
description: Lisk Surge is a 9-week DeFi initiative run by Lisk DAO in collaboration with Jumper, aimed at accelerating DeFi on Lisk and growing TVL on Lisk.
participate_description: Due to campaign set-up only deposits in your EOA wallets connected to your account will earn rewards. Perks earned by your account (incl multipliers) will be activated on all wallets you have connected.

name: SuperStacks
description: SuperStacks is an experimental pilot campaign designed to show how the Superchain can create a more connected onchain experience.
participate_description: Due to campaign set-up only deposits in your EOA wallets connected to your account will earn rewards. Perks earned by your account (incl multipliers) will be activated on all wallets you have connected.
